trans-unit.resname: RIX·1 | Baffling End | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Baffling End
trans-unit.target: 不知所终

trans-unit.resname: RIX·1 | Baffling End | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls with converted mana cost 3 or less.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，放逐目标由对手操控且总法术力费用等于或小于3的生物。

trans-unit.resname: RIX·1 | Baffling End | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME leaves the battlefield, target opponent creates a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME离开战场时，目标对手派出一个3/3绿色，具践踏异能的恐龙衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: RIX·2 | Bishop of Binding | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bishop of Binding
trans-unit.target: 镇魂主教

trans-unit.resname: RIX·2 | Bishop of Binding | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until CARDNAME leaves the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，放逐目标由对手操控的生物，直到CARDNAME离开战场为止。

trans-unit.resname: RIX·2 | Bishop of Binding | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, target Vampire gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the power of the exiled card.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，目标吸血鬼得+X/+X直到回合结束，X为所放逐之牌的力量。

trans-unit.resname: RIX·3 | Blazing Hope | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Blazing Hope
trans-unit.target: 耀目希望

trans-unit.resname: RIX·3 | Blazing Hope | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile target creature with power greater than or equal to your life total.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标力量等于或大于你总生命的生物。

trans-unit.resname: RIX·3 | Blazing Hope | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "No shadow remains for you to hide in."\n—Caparocti Sunborn
trans-unit.target: 「再也没有阴影供你躲藏。」 ～炫日卡帕罗提

trans-unit.resname: RIX·4 | Cleansing Ray | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cleansing Ray
trans-unit.target: 净化射线

trans-unit.resname: RIX·4 | Cleansing Ray | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose one —
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～

trans-unit.resname: RIX·4 | Cleansing Ray | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: • Destroy target Vampire.
trans-unit.target: •消灭目标吸血鬼。

trans-unit.resname: RIX·4 | Cleansing Ray | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: • Destroy target enchantment.
trans-unit.target: •消灭目标结界。

trans-unit.resname: RIX·4 | Cleansing Ray | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The sun creates, sustains, and consumes so it can create again."\n—Caparocti Sunborn
trans-unit.target: 「烈阳创生万物，维系成长，汲取精华，再孕新生。」 ～炫日卡帕罗提

trans-unit.resname: RIX·5 | Divine Verdict | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Divine Verdict
trans-unit.target: 明圣裁定

trans-unit.resname: RIX·5 | Divine Verdict | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标进行攻击或阻挡的生物。

trans-unit.resname: RIX·5 | Divine Verdict | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Cunning warriors and dim-witted beasts alike fall under the church's harsh judgment.
trans-unit.target: 无论是狡黠战士还是蠢笨野兽，都逃不出教会的严厉裁决。

trans-unit.resname: RIX·6 | Everdawn Champion | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Everdawn Champion
trans-unit.target: 霞辉斗士

trans-unit.resname: RIX·6 | Everdawn Champion | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 防止将对CARDNAME造成的所有战斗伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RIX·6 | Everdawn Champion | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Undefeated in battle, she is the shining future our empire deserves."\n—Huatli
trans-unit.target: 「她在战场上所向披靡，象征帝国应有之光辉未来。」 ～华特莉

trans-unit.resname: RIX·7 | Exultant Skymarcher | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Exultant Skymarcher
trans-unit.target: 欢欣天行客

trans-unit.resname: RIX·7 | Exultant Skymarcher | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: RIX·7 | Exultant Skymarcher | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We have come at last to this holiest of holy places. What was stolen from us long ago is ours once again."
trans-unit.target: 「吾人终踏足于此至圣之地。往昔遭窃之物也已复归我手。」

trans-unit.resname: RIX·8 | Famished Paladin | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Famished Paladin
trans-unit.target: 饥馑神圣武士

trans-unit.resname: RIX·8 | Famished Paladin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME doesn't untap during your untap step.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME于你的重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.resname: RIX·8 | Famished Paladin | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you gain life, untap CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当你获得生命时，重置CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: RIX·8 | Famished Paladin | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Loyal to his queen, slave to his thirst.
trans-unit.target: 效忠于女王，臣服于饥渴。

trans-unit.resname: RIX·9 | Forerunner of the Legion | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Forerunner of the Legion
trans-unit.target: 军团先驱

trans-unit.resname: RIX·9 | Forerunner of the Legion | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Vampire card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张吸血鬼牌，展示该牌，然后将你的牌库洗牌，并将该牌置于其上。

trans-unit.resname: RIX·9 | Forerunner of the Legion | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever another Vampire enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个吸血鬼在你的操控下进战场时，目标生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: RIX·10 | Imperial Ceratops | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Imperial Ceratops
trans-unit.target: 帝国犄角龙

trans-unit.resname: RIX·10 | Imperial Ceratops | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enrage — Whenever CARDNAME is dealt damage, you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 激怒～每当CARDNAME受到伤害时，你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: RIX·10 | Imperial Ceratops | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The music of blades against its silver armor merely inspires it to bellow more full-throated melodies."\n—Huatli
trans-unit.target: 「刀剑与其银甲碰撞而成之铿锵声响，只会诱其以深邃嚎吼回应。」 ～华特莉

trans-unit.resname: RIX·11 | Legion Conquistador | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Legion Conquistador
trans-unit.target: 军团征服者

trans-unit.resname: RIX·11 | Legion Conquistador | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may search your library for any number of cards named CARDNAME, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻任意数量名称为CARDNAME的牌，展示这些牌，将它们置于你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: RIX·11 | Legion Conquistador | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Legion of Dusk sailed from Torrezon in search of glory, riches, and the Immortal Sun.
trans-unit.target: 暮影军团从图瑞琮起航，离乡寻找荣耀、财富与永生圣阳的下落。

trans-unit.resname: RIX·12 | Luminous Bonds | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Luminous Bonds
trans-unit.target: 光缕禁锢

trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
trans-unit.target: 所结附的生物不能进行攻击或阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: RIX·12 | Luminous Bonds | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Your part in this fight is done, vampire. Get used to your thirst."
trans-unit.target: 「吸血鬼，你的战斗到此为止。好好体会饥渴的滋味吧。」

trans-unit.resname: RIX·13 | Majestic Heliopterus | Card Name

trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, another target Dinosaur you control gains flying until end of turn.

trans-unit.resname: RIX·13 | Majestic Heliopterus | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Its rise is like the sun's, a beautiful beginning. Its descent is like the sun's, a frightful ending."\n—Huatli
trans-unit.target: 「起如旭日飞升，朝气蓬勃；落似夕阳直下，暮色沉沉。」 ～华特莉

trans-unit.target: 暮影殉道者

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，派出一个1/1白色，具系命异能的吸血鬼衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: "Should I fall, take up our standard and carry on. The Legion must always prevail."
trans-unit.target: 「我若倒下，请执起旗帜继续前行。军团终必得胜。」

trans-unit.target: 得胜之时

trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+2/+2直到回合结束。你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: RIX·15 | Moment of Triumph | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The time of salvation is at hand. Dusk washes over the world, and the Legion will rise immortal!"
trans-unit.target: 「救赎之时就在眼前。暮影盖世，军团永存！」

trans-unit.resname: RIX·16 | Paladin of Atonement | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 在每个维持开始时，若你上回合曾失去生命，则在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: RIX·16 | Paladin of Atonement | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.resname: RIX·16 | Paladin of Atonement | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: For every wound there is a blessing; for every death, a reckoning.
trans-unit.target: 每处伤口皆有祝福；每次死亡皆有报应。

trans-unit.resname: RIX·17 | Pride of Conquerors | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 征服者之傲

trans-unit.resname: RIX·17 | Pride of Conquerors | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
trans-unit.target: 登殿（如果你操控十个或更多永久物，则于这盘游戏接下来的时段中，你得到黄金城祝福。）

trans-unit.resname: RIX·17 | Pride of Conquerors | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If you have the city's blessing, those creatures get +2/+2 until end of turn instead.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。如果你有黄金城祝福，则改为这些生物得+2/+2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.target: 辉煌命运

trans-unit.source: For the Legion of Dusk, the Immortal Sun is a source of eternal life. When they reclaim it, they will no longer be forced to subsist on the blood of the wicked.
trans-unit.target: 在暮影军团眼中，永生圣阳是其不老之身根源。重新夺回之后，便无需屈尊秽物之血过活。
